```java
package hello;

public class Hello {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("Hello life 中文");

	}

}

```

- 读输入（应声虫）

  ```java
  Scanner in =new Scanner(System.in);
  System.out.println("echo:" + in.nextLine());
  ```

  注意多进程一起跑

- 变量

  ```java
  int price;
  price=in.nextInt();
  ```
